entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
